section.name: 4 - Momentum
section.summary:
Objectives

By the end of this topic unit you should be able to:

  • Explain the meanings of and differences betweenÂ momentum, inertia, and impulse.
  • Explain what a system is and what it means for a system to be isolated.
  • Given a description of a situation and a definition of the physical system, judge whether the system is likely isolated.
  • Solve problems involving collisions in isolated systems.
  • Calculate the impulse imparted on an object or system.
